programme.title: Along Came A Spider
programme.desc: After the harrowing death of his partner, detective and best-selling author Alex Cross has retreated to the peace of retirement. But when a brilliant criminal (Michael Wincott) kidnaps a senator’s young daughter, Alex is lured back into action.

programme.title: Horsemen
programme.desc: A recently widowed detective still grieving over his wife's death discovers a shocking connection between himself and the suspects in a serial killing spree linked to the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.

programme.title: Vacancy

programme.title: Identity

programme.title: Layer Cake

programme.title: Heist
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the 1985 death of Natalie Antonetti, a woman who was part of the Austin, Texas music community. She was found beaten at home by her son, Johnny Goodie, and remained in a coma for two weeks before she died.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the May 5, 2009 murders of the wife and two children of Christopher Coleman, the security chief for televangelist Joyce Meyer Ministries.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: 48 Hours is television's most popular true-crime series, investigating shocking cases and compelling real-life dramas with journalistic integrity and cutting-edge style.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the 2008 murder of educator/artist Carol Kennedy, who was brutally beaten in her home outside Prescott, Arizona. Kennedy's ex-husband, stockbroker Steven DeMocker, became the chief suspect.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: An investigation into the death of Phillip Peatross, who was shot in the bedroom of his girlfriend, Caryn Kelley. Kelley claimed Peatross shot himself, but the police suspected foul play.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report about Kristen Cunnane, a former All-American swimmer who kept quiet about years of sexual abuse by a trusted female teacher and how her decision to go public led to the revelation that she was not alone.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the 2003 murder of Russel Douglas on Whidbey Island, Washington, and how the investigation led to the involvement of Peggy Sue Thomas, a one-time Washington beauty queen-turned-high-end limo driver.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the death of colorful entrepreneur and Las Vegas gambler Gary Triano, who was blown up in his car after finishing a round of golf at the exclusive La Paloma Country Club in Tucson, Arizona in 1996.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report featuring an exclusive interview with Tracey Grissom, who is on trial for the murder of her former husband, Hunter Grissom. Tracey details the abuse she claims to have suffered and the events that led her to shoot and kill him.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: An investigation into the October 2012 death of Bethany Deaton -- whether her death was a suicide, the fundamentalist Christian religious group to which she belonged, her marriage to the group's leader, and the quest by her family for answers.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the 1989 disappearance of college student Tiffany Sessions, a case which at the time generated one of the largest manhunts in the history of Florida.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the murder of Vanessa Mintz, who was gunned down at the family owned Saluda Mountain Lodge, in Saluda, North Carolina on Saturday, February 19, 2011.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: An investigation into the sometimes questionable practices in the business of international adoptions and how some overseas facilitators walk a fine line between adoption and child trafficking.

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.desc: When a cell phone signal causes apocalyptic chaos, an artist is determined to reunite with his young son.

programme.desc: A rape victim learns years after her attack that an innocent man was sent to prison; Espanola, New Mexico, a town that's a hub of lowrider culture.

programme.title: CatDog
programme.desc: CatDog's car breaks down, and they are forced to take it to Lube's garage. Dog finds Cat's old camera, and goes all around Nearburg taking pictures of people in embarrassing situations.

programme.desc: CatDog stumble upon a movie set, where they become stuntmen. CatDog convince Lola to infiltrate the Greasers and study their habits so they can find a weakness.

programme.desc: Doug is thrilled when Patti invites him to dinner, until he finds out that liver and onions will be served. He tries everything — including hypnosis—to finally overcome his phobia of the dish, but only to discover that Patti was just joking.

programme.title: Doug
programme.desc: This year's production of the annual pageant is being overseen by Judy, and she's inviting all the kids to rewrite the play.

programme.title: Doug
programme.desc: Roger tricks Doug into breaking a school rule and Lamarr Bone sentences the class to Saturday Detention. Doug is furious at Porkchop for tracking paw-prints all over his entry in the Arts Guild Exhibition.

programme.desc: Full moon: When the gang all decide that they are going to "moon" Principal Wartz, Arnold thinks that it's a bad idea, but ends up inadvertently getting caught and taking the blame. Student Teacher: Olga comes to PS 118 to be a student teacher.

programme.desc: Kenan makes it a mission to get his driver's license, a mission which requires the borrowing of Marc Cram's car for the test.

programme.desc: The guys want to go camping, but Gustavo nixes the idea because it’s dangerous. Instead they use their connections to camp on a sound stage, but things go awry as the guys try to show off their roughing it skills.

programme.title: Big Time Rush
programme.desc: Kendall and Logan volunteer at a dog shelter and end up adopting 12 dogs, but a sneaky heath inspector is on to them. Carlos and Jennifer’s puppy love is sickening and it’s up to James and the other Jennifers to rescue them.

programme.desc: Kendall buys Jo a gold necklace to show that he’s committed, but Camille thinks Logan bought it for her. Gustavo hangs BTR’s new gold record and Carlos and James wonder what would happen if they played it.

programme.title: Big Time Rush
programme.desc: Lucy releases her revenge album about Kendall and it becomes a huge hit! James, desperate for attention, creates a rumor that he and Cher Lloyd are recording a duet, and Carlos gets bad press after he appears to hit an old lady.

programme.desc: The guys are caught in a web of lies. Kendall has to keep Jo from discovering Lucy has returned to the Palm Woods. Logan’s fib about being sick turns into a medical emergency and Carlos and James claim Rocque Records was robbed.

programme.desc: Phil falls for the captain of the school soccer team. Meanwhile, Vice-Principal Pangborn asks Dil, Tommy, and Chuckie to hang around with his nephew, who turns out to be irritating and annoying.

programme.desc: Tired of being considered a goody two shoes by the popular kids, Susie tries desperately to prove that she can be a bad girl. Meanwhile, Phil discovers that he has a talent for cooking.

programme.title: All Grown Up
programme.desc: When Chuckie discovers that Kimi is upset, he gets the gang to help him redesign her room. It turns out that she is homesick for Japan and misses her biological father.

programme.title: All Grown Up
programme.desc: When the comic book starring Chuckie's favorite superhero gets canceled, he is too depressed to help Tommy with his science fair project. The gang tries to find Chuckie a new hero to worship.

programme.title: Zoey 101
programme.desc: Zoey has to make a decision whether stay at PCA or move to London with her parents. She asks her friends for advice, avoiding Chase until last. But before she can talk to him, he hears the news and ignores her for leaving him out of the loop.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: On a hot summer's day, life doesn't get much better than a big, juicy, smoky slab of spicy, mouth-watering ribs. Our goal was to produce flavorful, juicy, tender ribs that would be well worth the time, money, and effort.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We were intrigued with the notion of barbecuing a whole side of salmon. Our goal was to have this large piece of fish spend enough time over the coals to pick up some real wood flavor.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We move the turkey out of the oven and onto the grill, freeing up precious cooking space for other Thanksgiving dishes and giving us a better tasting bird. We also perfect the flavor and texture of sweet potatoes and cranberry sauce.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Beef tenderloin can cost a small fortune, but it is one of the quickest and easiest large cuts to serve to a crowd. The key is to get good color development on the exterior without overcooking the interior.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Ham dinner—with green bean casserole—is classic American fare. But which kind of ham should you buy? And can you really make a "good" green bean casserole? We show you how.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Our sour cream coffee cake and light, flavorful fruit salads transform weekend brunch into an indulgent meal you'll want to make even when company isn't coming over. A few tips on great coffee round out the perfect start to a day.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The appeal of such quick bread as cinnamon buns and banana bread is clear. Supermarket cinnamon buns often have an odd, artificial flavor and sponge-like texture. And banana bread doesn't need to taste like over-the-hill bananas.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Real country bread, the kind made by an artisan and never found at the supermarket, is a thing of beauty. We wanted to develop a recipe that was every bit as good as the best country loaves but that was still doable for the cook who bakes in a home oven.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Thick, chewy chocolate cookies and spiced molasses cookies are classics. Watch as we discover which types of chocolate and molasses make these favorites great again.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Lemon meringue pie is a three-part recipe—crust, lemon filling, and meringue—and each one can be a challenge. We discover which rolling pins are best and whether you can use store-bought pie crust in a pinch. Then we perfect the filling and meringue.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: What could be more American than strawberry shortcake? But sometimes this classic summer fare can go terribly wrong. When it comes to cherry cobbler, sour cherries are a must. But where do you get sour cherries? Are jarred cherries a worthy alternative?

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Who can resist a chocolate cake? We wanted cakes that would be great tasting and easy to prepare, and we came up with two: old-fashioned, moist, and homey; the other elegant, dense, and ethereal.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: A true New York-style cheesecake should be pure and minimalist but also have just the right color, flavor, and density. With a crisp graham cracker crust and a filling that fades from creamy to cake-like, our cheesecake is worthy of any diner in New York.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Who doesn't like a plate of good nachos or Buffalo wings? We discover when you can use supermarket products versus when only good, fresh ingredients will do. A simple, sweet-tart sangria finishes our party menu.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: On a cold day, few dishes are as comforting as a hearty soup—unless it turns out starchy or gluey. Watch as we make thick and creamy versions of two of our favorites: ham and split pea, and rustic potato-leek.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Our goal was simple: Rescue two favorite fancy vegetable dishes—twice-baked potatoes and stuffed bell peppers—from the clutches of cafeterias, bad steakhouses, and frozen food manufacturers.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Bistro classics, such as steak au poivre and crème brûlée, offer a taste of real French cooking without pretension. We show you how to create these dishes without spending all day in the kitchen.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen shows you how to make the perfect steakhouse dinner—salad with creamy blue cheese dressing and seared filet mignon.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We show you how to prepare fried rice and kung pao shrimp. Our findings of rice cookers and long-grain white rice guarantee perfect rice every time.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Simple yet interesting, both chicken Milanese and chicken piccata are reliable test kitchen favorites. We like to start them on the stovetop but finish the cooking in the oven

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen provides foolproof recipes for two classic pasta sauces: puttanesca and Bolognese.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pasta with garlic and oil is perhaps the most famous quick pasta dish. It starts with ingredients on hand—garlic, good olive oil, hot red pepper flakes—and turns them into something special and uncommonly good.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We uncover the secrets to beef Burgundy at its best—and also show you a way to make portions of it ahead of time.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We traveled to chili country, cooked with various experts in their kitchens, and tried out dozens of recipes in the test kitchen. We wanted a chili that would be hearty, heavy on the meat, and spicy but not overwhelmingly hot.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Macaroni and cheese and turkey Tetrazzini are two classic casseroles, but they are rarely as good as they could be. We knew we could do better—much better—in the test kitchen.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pork chops are leaner than they used to be, which poses new problems for home cooks. We explain which chops to buy and how to cook them, ensuring perfectly cooked meat that is both crispy and juicy.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: On a hot summer's day, life doesn't get much better than a big, juicy, smoky slab of spicy, mouth-watering ribs. Our goal was to produce flavorful, juicy, tender ribs that would be well worth the time, money, and effort.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): A plena vista
programme.desc: Danny y Baez se enfrentan a la tarea de localizar a un traficante de drogas después de que dos jóvenes modelos aparezcan muertas por sobredosis. Además, Eddie y Jamie se unen para determinar quién es el autor intelectual de un robo.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Secretos de familia
programme.desc: Después de obtener una coincidencia de un pariente desconocido de una red de ADN, Sean Reagan investiga para averiguar quién podría ser esta persona misteriosa.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando Morgan es secuestrado, la UAC se apresura a buscarlo y salvarle la vida.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC se dirige a Wichita en busca de un sospechoso que secuestra niños mientras sus padres duermen. Además, Morgan está intentando averiguar quién fue el responsable del ataque.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando un sujeto ataca a la UAC, el equipo entra en acción para averiguar quién es el responsable.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando la ex miembro del equipo de la UAC y actual agente de la Interpol, Emily Prentiss localiza a un asesino en serie internacional, pide la ayuda de sus amigos de la UAC.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fin del juego
programme.desc: Con la ayuda del equipo, Vance se enfrenta a sus demonios mientras descubre una compleja relación con un asesino que pone en peligro a toda su familia.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Apagón
programme.desc: El equipo se encuentra literalmente a oscuras cuando la investigación sobre la muerte de un teniente se relaciona con un apagón en toda la ciudad.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Juego de niños
programme.desc: El trabajo diurno de un marine muerto en un laboratorio de ideas del gobierno lleva a Gibbs y al equipo a la vida de un niño prodigio de 12 años que puede ser el próximo objetivo del asesino.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Fe
programme.desc: Cuando el hijo alistado de un coronel retirado convertido en predicador aparece muerto, el equipo cree que puede ser víctima de un crimen de odio. Mientras tanto, el padre de Gibbs viene de visita por vacaciones.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Reglas no escritas
programme.desc: Cuando un robo a mano armada termina con la muerte de un oficial, Frank busca justicia. Pero las tensiones aumentan en la casa de los Reagan cuando Erin retira los cargos al sospechoso por falta de evidencia.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La ciudad que nunca duerme
programme.desc: Cuando el famoso actor Russell Berke, quien siguió a Danny para investigar su próximo papel, es apuñalado, Danny lo ayuda, pero debe mantener el crimen en secreto debido al estatus de celebridad de Russell.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Proteger y servir
programme.desc: Danny negocia con un hombre que mantiene a Erin como rehén en la corte. Mientras, Frank decide el castigo para Jamie, quien desobedeció órdenes y fue suspendido.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): La verdad sobre mentir
programme.desc: Danny y Baez investigan la muerte de una adolescente empujada al metro. Frank se molesta por la supervisión del nuevo Inspector General en el NYPD.

programme.title: Traficantes de pánico

programme.title: 3 hombres en mi vida

programme.title: A la orilla de un palmar

programme.title: A los cuatro vientos

programme.title: Acá las tortas (Los hijos de los ricos)

programme.title: Al caer la tarde
programme.desc: Un hombre de origen humilde enriquecido a traves del trabajo duro, corteja a la hija de un terrateniente arruinado. Él le propone casamiento y así recuperar su posición económica y social, pero ella lo rechaza.

programme.title: Escobar: La herencia maldita

programme.title: Escobar: La herencia maldita
programme.desc: Después de la muerte de Pablo Escobar, Juan Pablo, a la edad de 16 años, lucha por sobrevivir al legado de un imperio del narcotráfico.

programme.title: Escobar: La herencia maldita
programme.desc: Cuando el imperio Escobar se desmorona, la familia se vuelve una contra otra, mientras los carteles rivales exigen la muerte de Juan Pablo.

programme.title: Una niñera engañosa

programme.title: Bandidos

programme.title: Destrucción
programme.desc: Una detective de policía reconecta con gente relacionada con una misión encubierta de hace años para encontrar paz.

programme.title: Un plan sencillo
programme.desc: Dos hermanos encuentran cuatro millones de dólares en una avioneta caída e intentan quedarse con el dinero, pero la paranoia, la codicia y el miedo a ser capturado hacen que su plan esté fuera de control, con consecuencias desastrosas.

programme.title: Sophie's Choice

programme.title: La conquista del honor

programme.title: Las cuatro plumas

programme.title: El pequeño Tate

programme.title: No sin mi hija

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: Un equipo de agentes especiales internacionales debe llevar a cabo una misión misteriosa: robar un maletín fuertemente custodiado buscado tanto por el IRA como por la mafia rusa.

programme.title: Yo soy la venganza

programme.title: The Crime of Father Amaro

programme.title: Sospechoso cero

programme.desc: Spencer Tracy and Fredric March go toe-to-toe in this powerful recreation of a titanic courtroom battle in which an attorney faces off against a fundamentalist in a Tennessee town where a teacher has been brought to trial for teaching Darwinism.

programme.title: Taxi

programme.title: Taxi

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: La coartada

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.title: Archaeology: A Secret History
programme.desc: Archaeologist Richard Miles shows how discoveries in the 18th and 19th centuries overturned ideas of when and where civilisation began, as empires competed to `own' the past.

programme.title: Archaeology: A Secret History
programme.desc: Richard Miles shows how 20th-century attention turned from civilisation and kings to the search for the common man against a background of science and competing political ideologies.

programme.title: Lost Cities of The Ancients
programme.desc: A journey to discover the legendary lost city of Piramesse, a magnificent ancient capital built 3,000 years ago by the Egyptian pharaoh Ramesses the Great.

programme.title: Lost Cities of The Ancients
programme.desc: In the Lambeyeque valley in northern Peru lies a strange lost world, the forgotten ruins of 250 mysterious pyramids, including some of the biggest on the planet, colossal structures made out of mud bricks.

programme.title: Lost Cities of The Ancients
programme.desc: It was one of the greatest vanishing acts in history. More than 3,000 years ago a mysterious and ruthless civilisation rose from nothing, created a brutal and unstoppable army and built an empire that rivalled Egypt and Babylon.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: It is only in recent years that experts have unearthed the biggest dinosaurs that ever lived. One monster eclipsed all others, more than seven times as heavy as diplodocus was the immense argentinosaurus.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A new generation of carnivores was about to take killing to the next level. At the end of the Cretaceous period, these new hunter killers had spread throughout the globe.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A look at bizarre dinosaurs such as the curious buck-toothed Exipdexipteryx, the amazing four-winged Microraptor and the pot-bellied Nothronychus.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring the newfound remains of a dinosaur species considered the biggest carnivore in history, all while posing the question whether they engaged in a fight against the Argentinasaurus.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The life of the first reptilian carnivores on Earth, told through computer animation.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The Jurassic period saw the advent of the largest and strongest dinosaurs that ever roamed the Earth.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: A look at the world as it was 149 million years ago - in the late Jurassic Period. The old continents have broken up and much of the land is under water. Huge shallow seas have supported a revolution in marine life.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: With wings longer than those of a small plane, pterosaurs were the largest creatures ever known to have flown.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: This programme looks at the Cretaceous period, 106 million years ago. Volcanic activity forces the continents apart, and dinosaurs diversify into a range of species to cope with environmental extremes.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: It is the late Cretaceous period and Tyrannosaurus rex is the top predator, but the Earth is poisoned by volcanic activity and a comet strikes.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve is going large as he focuses on the biggest animals to have ever walked the earth. In his dino-den, he starts by meeting the Argentinosaurus, an animal so large that even its poo was deadly.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The Jurassic was home to the most vicious and violent predators the world has ever seen. To survive, herbivores had to fight back. Steve Backshall goes on a mission to track down the deadliest of all dinosaur defenders.

programme.desc: A family deals with a stray dog who bites; Daisy Fuentes has trouble controlling her English bulldog.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's good friend and fellow bondsman Chris is running out of time. He has only days to find his fugitive or risk losing his business. In his hunt, Dog confronts duplicitous tipsters, vicious attack dogs, and hostile neighbors.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The bounty-hunter adventures of Duane "Dog" Chapman and his Posse are chronicled in this one hour "Best Of" special, featuring superlative memorable moments from the previous seven seasons.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog launches a high stake hunt through the desolate and dangerous mountain landscape of western Colorado in pursuit of a gun-loving survivalist with a million dollar bond on his head. Will Dog's plan of using brains over brawn work?

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Once in Montrose, Dog discovers that the million dollar fugitive is not the young bondsman's only problem. Dog and Beth make it their mission to both clean up the mess and teach him the fundamentals of bondsmanship.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is committed to saving his new friend's bail bonding business, and now must race against time to bring a rogues' gallery to justice in the High Sierra mountain town of Montrose, CO.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With four outlaws still on the lam, Dog sets out to bring 'em in. As day turns into night and with the darkness and the danger mounting, an undaunted Dog and team plan late night hits on the riskiest of locations--their targets' homes.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With a long record of violence and abuse and weighing in at over 200lbs, Dog's target for the day does not sound like a gentle giant. When the trail grows cold, Dog turns up the heat on the fugitive's brother and sister.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Leland has to attend a Lamaze class before he can join the hunt--another Chapman is on the way! But when Dog starts to go after this accused jewelry thief without his fastest son, he learns that this fugitive puts the "R" in runner.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When Dog discovers today's prey is a notorious ladies man, he knows just how to lure him in. The trap includes a suggestive phone call, a motel rendezvous, and a crew of bounty hunters waiting in the next room ready to break up the party!

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today's fugitive is accused of assaulting a police officer, so Dog and the team are not taking any chances. So Dog has to play on his target's greed and deploy some modern technology to set a trap for this runner.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Baby Lyssa wakes up in a jail cell, but ignores the ensuing media frenzy in order to befriend a woman waging a personal battle against drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A fugitive with a long criminal record has fled to Hawaii, and the bondsman on the mainland has asked Dog for help. Dog doesn't have much information to work with, but he can use the felon's desire to impress his friends to track him down.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: To his traditional bounty hunting tools of confidential informants, canvassing, and silver-tongued subterfuge, the world's greatest bounty hunter has added Facebook! A word to the wise for those on the run-post at your own peril, the Dog is watching!

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog likes to say, "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree," and this is a hunt where that is true. So will Dog be able to use one family member's troubled ways to catch another one in trouble with the law?

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Middle Eastern oilman Farouk, anxious for vengeance against Blake, tells Nick that Carrington is responsible for the death of his brother. Nick attacks Blake, who is left unconscious at the bottom of a deep ravine.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle finds Blake in the mountains and gets him to the hospital. Nick Toscanni disappears. Cecil is also brought to the hospital, and he's very weak. A police investigation is started to find the baby.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Michael goes to Denver to find out who he is. Alexis and Cecil plan a wedding in the hospital. Claudia disappears and Blake suspects her of kidnapping the baby. There's an exciting drama on the roof of a tall building.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: The baby is recovered from the real kidnapper, Alfred Grimes, and it turns out he's the father of Roger Grimes. Fallon fires Susan. Claudia leaves for a sanitarium. Fallon starts looking for a job. Blake gives her his hotel La Mirada.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Cecil leaves his estate and Colbyco to Jeff and Alexis. He also reveals his "Rhinewood" game to Blake at the reading of his will. Blake suspects Alexis of being a part of it.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis gives her newfound long-lost son Adam a job at Colbyco. Blake starts to believe that Adam may actually be his real son. Fallon and Adam keep flirting with each other, not knowing they are siblings. Adam has dinner with Krystle and Blake.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake tries to be friends with Adam, but Adam rejects him. Alexis tells Mark that he's still married to Krystle. Mark seeks to get a job as a tennis pro at Fallon's hotel.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Joseph's daughter, Kirby comes to stay with the Carringtons after breaking up with her fiance in France. Joseph tries to persuade her to go back to him. Mark gets the job at Fallon's hotel. Blake tries to get help from Congressman Neal McVane.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Fallon gets a letter from Steven and it turns out he's on an oil rig in the Java Sea, Indonesia. Adam mixes the toxic compound in the paint for Jeff's new office. Fallon hires Kirby as a nanny for little Blake.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Jeff starts to become dizzy and affected by the toxic paint Adam used in his office. Joseph tells Kirby to stay away from Jeff. Krystle goes to Acapulco to find out what really happened with the so-called divorce from Mark.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: The Carrington family is informed that Steven's oil rig exploded. Blake goes to look for him, with an uninvited Alexis. Sammy Jo's father returns to Denver to collect Sammy Jo's share of Steven's inheritance, but Krystle throws him out.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis and Blake continue the search for Steven in Indonesia but find evidence that Steven might be dead. Blake refuses to believe it, and hires a psychic, Jason Denner, to help. Jeff gets really ill from the paint in his office. Adam rapes Kirby.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Back in Denver, Blake continues his frantic search for Steven with the help of psychic Jason Dehner. Blake refuses to believe his son is dead, and Krystle is worried about his erratic behavior. Fallon mends fences with stepmother, Krystle.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: An obviously ill Jeff continues to function in a confused state. Sammy Jo announces she's headed for New York to make it big as a model and no longer wants to keep her son, Danny. Blake offers the girl $100,000 to be a mother to the child.

programme.desc: Ginka and Yuki travel to an ancient Bey Temple to battle Bao and Aguma of Beylin Fist in the final of the Toryumon Tag Team Tournament. The Beylin Fist team starts strong and soon has Gingka and Yuki in a tough spot.

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fury
programme.desc: After winning the Tag Team Tournament, Bao and Aguma disappear in a helicopter. They are followed by Johannes into the wilderness, where he says he has news about the star fragment in Aguma's Bey.

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fury
programme.desc: Aguma and Bao follow Johannes to meet Pluto, who wants Beylin Fist to join him in his dark quest for power. Gingka and his friends travel to Greece where they meet Sophie, Wales, Julian, and Klaus.

programme.title: Bakugan Gundalian Invaders
programme.desc: Marucho finds a security system being run out of "Baku-Room."

programme.title: Bakugan Gundalian Invaders
programme.desc: When the invading Gundalians break through the outer shield, Neathian Castle Guard Linus flees to Earth in search of Fabia.

programme.title: Bakugan Gundalian Invaders
programme.desc: The Brawlers infiltrate Bakugan Interspace and walk into the middle of a Gundalian power struggle.

programme.title: Bakugan Gundalian Invaders
programme.desc: Given a brief pardon by Barodius after his earlier failure, Ren hatches a plot with Zenet to regain possession of the Element.

programme.title: Bakugan Gundalian Invaders
programme.desc: The Brawlers arrive at Neathia and meet Fabia's sister Queen Serena.

programme.title: Bakugan Gundalian Invaders
programme.desc: There is only one shield protecting Neathia from the Gundalian forces.

programme.title: Bakugan Gundalian Invaders
programme.desc: Dan, Fabia, and Shun continue to make their way through the jungle to the shield generator building.

programme.title: Di-Gata Defenders
programme.desc: The Defenders secret training is interrupted when an earthquake signals that the monstrously evil Megalith is breaking free.

programme.title: Di-Gata Defenders
programme.desc: On their way to the Monastery of Amos-Yan to recover The Key, a device which will lead them to the four pure stones, Seth, and his fellow Di-Gata Defenders are ambushed by a band of thieves.

programme.title: Di-Gata Defenders
programme.desc: The Monastery burns as Malco and Flinch, powerful agents of the Order Infinis tear it apart looking for The Key.

programme.title: Di-Gata Defenders
programme.desc: With The Key in hand, the Defenders and Adam, set off to find the first Pure Stone.

programme.title: Di-Gata Defenders
programme.desc: Erik is kidnapped by a carnival of misfits and the Defenders must fight to get him back.

programme.title: Di-Gata Defenders
programme.desc: For the first time in their lives, the defenders find themselves on the high seas and discover that their Di-Gata stones don't work over water!

programme.title: Bakugan: Battle Planet
programme.desc: Shun and Lia are forced to battle a Bakuzoned Ichiro! Shun, Lia and Masato must square off against the Dusk Forces, but they are not alone and are joined by Lt. Brenan and Kino.

programme.title: Bakugan: Battle Planet
programme.desc: Dusk Forces storm the Numena Core Cell. Tiko/Dusk Forces are waging a no holds barred assault on the Numena Core Cell.

programme.title: Bakugan: Battle Planet
programme.desc: The final showdown between Tiko and AO with the future of Earth and Vestroia in balance. The Awesome Ones return home as heroes, wondering what battles await them in the future.

programme.title: Bakugan: Battle Planet
programme.desc: Dan meets his partner Bakugan Drago for the first time. / Dan and friends win the Bakugan Battle, establishing the Awesome Ones as our heroes

programme.title: Bakugan: Battle Planet
programme.desc: The local Burger Joint is being threatened by a rogue Bakugan. / The AO stop neighborhood kids from copycat behavior (namely, using their Bakugan for frivolous reasons).

programme.title: LEGO Chima
programme.desc: Cragger and the Crocodiles taken prisoners by the Wolves. Laval determined to free his old friend. Laval, Eris, and the mysterious ShadoWind attempt a rescue.… but something about ShadoWind isn’t quite right.

programme.title: LEGO Chima
programme.desc: Cragger has been freed and wants to give out CHI to all tribes of Chima, but he has none. He employs a strange Raven alchemist to produce some fake CHI. But the fake CHI has some very unexpected side effects, and the alchemist has an agenda of his own.

programme.title: LEGO Dreamzzz
programme.desc: The hunt for the Sandman, the only one who can repair Lunia's hourglass, brings the kids to the dangerous Murky Realm, where memories go to die!

programme.title: LEGO Dreamzzz
programme.desc: Determined to give the Insomniac's a night of good dreams, Izzie and friends bring them to the Candy Realm; but nowhere is safe from Nightmare King.

programme.title: LEGO Dreamzzz
programme.desc: The Dream Chasers arrive at Castle Nocturnia hoping to find the key to defeating the Nightmare King, but the castle won't reveal its secrets easily.

programme.title: LEGO Dreamzzz
programme.desc: The Dream Chasers rush to crack the code to reveal Lunia's secrets while the Nightmare King presses a full-scale assault on Castle Nocturnia.

programme.title: LEGO Dreamzzz
programme.desc: The Nightmare King begins to open a rift to the Waking World while Mateo presses Oz for the truth about Lunia's battle with the Nightmare King.

programme.title: LEGO Dreamzzz
programme.desc: A night terror is on the hunt at the fall festival and so is the Night Hunter, who appears in the Waking World with a brand-new threat for Mateo.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: It's "Hands Off Day!" a city holiday, where the entire city doesn't use their hands for anything. A nature documentary crew follows Billionaire Fendrich as if he was an animal in the wild.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: Teenage superstar, Poppy Starr, visits her grandfather, Sargent Sam Grizzled. Billy and Madison lose a flying disc inside a creepy-looking house.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: The Mayor and Carol work late when all manner of strange events begin to happen. Extreme Sports host, Dynamo, holds a competition to see who will go on the City Mars mission.

programme.title: LEGO Jurassic World
programme.desc: Something mysterious lurking in the jungle wrecks a construction site, and Hudson is convinced a ghost is responsible ... but it might be something even more surprising.

programme.title: LEGO Jurassic World
programme.desc: Danny releases an energy drink into the dinosaurs' water supply, making them extra-energetic ... and extra dangerous!

programme.title: LEGO Jurassic World
programme.desc: Owen falls prey to the toxin of a poisonous prehistoric jungle flower and believes he's a raptor!

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: Force From the East
programme.desc: The ninjas find two old dragon masters who agree to train them. Meanwhile, Ras invades the Land of Lost Things.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: The Spell at the Waterfall
programme.desc: Egalt teaches the Rising Dragon to the ninja; Sora and Riyu learn Spinjitzu from Rontu; Cole reaches the Monastery with the Finders and sets off on an adventure with Zane.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: To Mysterium
programme.desc: Cole, Zane and Bonzle travel to Mysterium, only to fall into Dorama's trap; Arin is frustrated with his Spinjitzu training.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Atop their dragons, the Ninja return to Ninjago City amidst Garmadon’s vicious attack. Master Wu and the Ninja join up with Lloyd, Nya, and Dareth and they celebrate their reunion.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The four Ninja are snapped out of their post-hero complacency when Lord Garmadon’s son Lloyd shows up and tries to pick up where his father left off. The Ninja dismiss him as a threat, but regret that choice after Lloyd wakes up the evil snake tribe.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Back in training mode with the looming threat of Lloyd and the Hypnobrai, Zane wanders after a Falcon and lands himself in a heap of trouble. The rest of the Ninja leave the training dojo to help him and return to find that the snakes have burned it …

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Lloyd, having been kicked out of the Hynobrai snake tribe unlocks a second tribe – The Fangpyres – to help him regain control.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: After the Fangpyres join forces with the Hypnobrai, Lloyd awakens Pythor – the last remaining snake of the Anacondrai tribe.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Lloyd moves in and tries to make nice by helping out with chores, but he just gets in the way. Pythor has awoken the Vipoids and the Constrictaurs and an all out snake war has taken over Ninjago.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Pythor declares himself to be the destined leader who will reawaken The Great Devourer – an ancient beast who can’t be killed and will consume all of Ninjago. We find out Nya is the Samurai and Lloyd is taken prisoner by the snake tribes.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Jay and Nya have to cut their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park short as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve the first or four fang blades to be used to awaken the Great Devourer.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego no cumple con sus responsabilidades con la casa por lo que es expulsado por Gaspar. El Noruego se embarca en una travesía sin saber que lleva un ángel guardián. Segunda parte.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego y Peluzin empiezan un Boy Band, Gaspar se ve forzado a integrarse por problemas económicos. El Abuelo intenta comenzar una relación amorosa.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego tiene problemas con el alcohol, y destruye el departamento. Peluzin descubre que va a heredar una gran cantidad de dinero y el Abuelo lo ayuda.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego, traumado por asistir a una corrida de toros, cambia su estilo de vida. Jonathan se entera de una noticia que cambiara su vida.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar pierde su trabajo y se desconecta del mundo mientras que el Abuelo y el Noruego empiezan un negocio.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo y el Noruego suben de peso y Jonathan tiene problemas con un bully en la escuela.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Una persona del pasado del Abuelo reaparece en su vida. El Noruego tiene problemas dentales.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar invita a la familia a un viaje muy especial para él. Peluzin se pega al plan.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego tiene un sueño de convertirse en policía. El Abuelo sufre un accidente en la regadera

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo entra en el mundo de la actuación y Peluzín es arrestado.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo se de cuenta que el y el Noruego pueden ser padre e hijo. Pitipú es atropellado.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo, con la ayuda de Gaspar, hace una lista de todas las cosas que quiere hacer antes de morir. Peluzin y el Noruego están adictos a un videojuego.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: En este episodio La familia del barrio muestra una divertida parodia a las Sitcoms mas populares, desde la óptica del prototipo de familia mexicana disfuncional.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Salubridad clausura el Tenta-Culo e Irma consigue trabajo como empleada domestica en el departamento de los Del Barrio.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo necesita un trasplante de riñón y ninguno de los Del Barrio es compatible para donarle uno. Sin embargo, Peluzín tiene la solución en sus manos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego se lanza como candidato a Presidente del Condominio. Sin embargo, un oponente inesperado eclipsa sus planes en plena campaña.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Las noticias anuncian que un meteorito chocará contra la tierra, acabando con todos los seres vivientes. Los Del Barrio se preparan para el Apocalipsis.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: En una borrachera, el Abuelo y el Noruego atropellan con su coche a Santa Claus justo antes de la Navidad. Para no dejar a los niños sin regalos, el Abuelo toma el lugar del accidentado.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Don Sebas se casa en una isla tropical y todos viajan a la boda. Sin embargo, los descuidos del Abuelo hacen que casi se pierda el evento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Los del Barrio llegan a su edificio y se dan cuenta que está rodeado por un gran muro que les impide la entrada.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar les restringe el dinero al Abuelo y al Noruego ocasionando que el Noruego tenga que consumir un licor hecho en casa por Peluzín lo que lo deja ciego.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego lleva a Jonathan al museo de antropología por encargo de su escuela y se da cuenta que un personaje del Calendario Azteca se parece mucho a él.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La Familia del Barrio se va de vacaciones a Acapulco, invitados por Gaspar. Después de una gran borrachera en el Baby'O, el abuelo amanece en la casa de Acapulco Shore.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Accidentalmente, el Abuelo descubre las habilidades boxísticas de Peluzín y se dedica a explotarlas. Mientras, el Noruego se embarca en la búsqueda de un nuevo hobbie.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Camino a rentar una película, el Noruego adquiere una nueva mascota. En tanto, Peluzín tiene que mudarse de su departamento por falta de pago.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego se topa con un niño de la calle con quien supuestamente mantiene un parentesco mientras que Peluzín organiza un negocio piramidal para aprovecharse de todos los del edificio

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries
programme.desc: Kenya's growing human population means wildlife land is shrinking.

programme.title: Wild Korea

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Elands lock corkscrew horns; storks rattle sabre-shaped beaks; rhinos scare the competition with massive horns; striped marlins spear unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Madagascar is home to strange animals not found anywhere else on Earth; when these animals fight for supremacy, their battles are just as strange, from weird neck-wrestling weevils to ring tailed lemur moms that go into battle with baby on board.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse; the beach turns into a dueling ground and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: World's Deadliest
programme.desc: Living in paradise is no holiday for many animals as it is hunting grounds for some terrifying and deadly creatures.

programme.title: World's Deadliest
programme.desc: Baby predators learn to hunt and some emerge from the womb ready to kill.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether it's head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Welcome to India - a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare; monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Steering clear of alphas, whose horns, claws and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out; examining killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: A male brown hare throws punches at his beloved; admiring a sandhill crane dance battle; ibexes butt heads (literally) during mating season; why leopards are stealth masters.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Massive elephant seals go nose to nose to win the title of beach master; giant petrels earn the nickname "murderous garbagemen"; a female humpback goes to extremes to protect her calf from amorous males.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Canada, where summer is short and time is tight, any time is the right time to fight; the mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Analyzing the shady methods that animal delinquents use to create fear and chaos.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca remembers the first time she meets Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #13: Alcatraz Connection
programme.desc: Master thief Lupin III, gunslinger Jigen and swordmaster Goemon are back for a new caper, this time aboard the casino-ship Machine Gun Kelly. Between the mafia, interpol, and a secret organization based under Alcatraz!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #14 Episode 0: The First Contact
programme.desc: The stickup that started it all! Lupin and Fujiko are both after an ancient artifact Jigen is supposed to protect, while Goemon happens to be searching for his clan's lost treasure nearby. Of course, Inspector Zenigata isn't far behind.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #15: Operation: Return the Treasure
programme.desc: Lupin sets his sights on the legendary Trick Diamond, stolen by his late rival Mark Williams. Instead of finding the diamond, Fujiko relays Mark's dying challenge: return all the other treasures he stole to reveal the location of the gem.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #16: Swallowtail Tatoo
programme.desc: A mysterious criminal captures Lupin and Fujiko with a very specific order: in order to save Fujiko's life, Lupin must infiltrate a high-security museum and steal the Bull's Eye jewel. One little problem: the jewel is cursed to kill anyone who steals it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's new target is the digital currency gained from the transactions made on this site. Lupin sneaks into a massive high-security server facility, known as the "twin towers". Lupin greets the guard to the key, a young girl and skilled hacker "Ami".

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Hunt down the greatest thief of our times, Lupin III!" The Marco Polo executives have set a trap in the form of the Lupin Game. This has people all over the world tracking down Lupin.

programme.title: La venganza de los ex

programme.title: La venganza de los ex

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales

programme.title: Rugrats: aventuras en pañales

programme.title: The Maury Show

programme.title: The Maury Show

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.desc: Melissa swears that her mother Jessica is engaged to a serial cheater named Lee, but he says they're lying. Then, is Amber's fiancé Robby sleeping with other women…including her friend's mom? We'll find out on today's MAURY!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his crew make their way towards Arlong Park and a showdown with its fishy proprietor. Along the way, they discover a treasure map that raises more questions about Nami.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A fierce argument over where Nami’s loyalties lie divides the Straw Hat Pirates and only one thing’s for sure – no one is willing to risk their life for a traitor.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami’s adopted sister, Nojiko arrives to fill in some details about the skilled mapmaker’s younger days.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nojiko continues the story of Nami’s younger days. Back in the present, Nami gets agonizingly close to a long time goal, but betrayal looms on the horizon.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nezumi comes to confiscate Nami’s treasure, but who’s he working for? More importantly, who’s Nami working for, and what’s she gonna do with her booty?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats’ faith in Nami is restored, and now it’s time for a battle royal! Luffy and the gang are determined to make Arlong pay for mistreating their friend.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats and Arlong’s fishermen are locked in a swashbuckling slugfest, but things take a bad turn when Luffy gets trapped beneath the waves.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While his friends work to free the captain of the Straw Hats, cowardly Usopp finds himself in a position to shed his yellow streak and make his father proud.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami must decide between letting Arlong maintain his hold over her, or joining the Straw Hats and leading the oppressed villagers against the tyrant Fishman.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Arlong better watch his back-fins, because Captain Luffy knows about all the horrible things he did to Nami – and it makes his blood boil.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Something about Nami’s former prison gives Luffy an added burst of strength. He’s so moved by her terrible past that he vows to destroy all of Arlong Park!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After a grueling fight, Luffy defeats Arlong and succeeds in destroying his headquarters. The merry marauders enjoy the fruits of victory while Nami makes peace with her turbulent past.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Finally, the day has arrived where Luffy’s face is on an authentic wanted poster! Now there are enemies in hot pursuit as the crew makes waves for Logue Town – the final resting place of Gold Roger!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Buggy gets marooned on an island inhabited by unusual creatures and tangles with the island’s caretaker, Gaimon. If he is to finally destroy Luffy, Buggy must cast his lot with a mysterious woman.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Buggy Pirates fight each other for the right to take their lost captain’s place. While they’re busy beating each other’s brains out, a cannibalistic tribe makes plans to have something special for dinner.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats arrive at Logue Town, and each crewmember embarks upon a mission of a more personal nature. While his crew shops, Luffy goes in search of sacred ground.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy has a run-in with Captain Smoker, and his failure to keep a low profile helps Buggy draw a bead on him. Elsewhere, Zoro takes a chance that his skill can overcome a dangerous curse.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Usopp finds an amazing pair of sharpshooter’s goggles, but they lead to a run-in with Daddy the Parent – the greatest gunslinger ever! Now, the Straw Hat marksman is headed for the deadliest of all duels.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A cooking competition with the fiery chef Carmen rekindles Sanji’s dreams of the legendary All Blue.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Buggy and his mysterious female ally trap Luffy on the same platform where Gold Roger was executed. He is to be killed for his offenses against Buggy, but Zoro and Sanji attempt a daring rescue mission.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As a storm batters Logue Town, Buggy, Alvida, and Captain Smoker close in on Luffy for a stirring final showdown!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The discovery of a small girl adrift in an abandoned lifeboat interrupts Luffy and his crew’s voyage to the Grand Line.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After escaping the clutches of the Marine fleet, the Straw Hats soon find themselves in an equally dangerous predicament – stranded in the Calm Belt!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats want to return Apis’s dragon to his nest, but the Marines have them surrounded. Looks like it’s time for another daring escape!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Even for Nami, finding the dragon’s lost island proves to be tougher than looking for a needle in a haystack – or at the bottom of the ocean.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami discovers a map to the true location of the dragon’s nest, and Zorro puts his steel to the test against Eric the Whirlwind.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats sail headfirst into Commodore Nelson and his Marine armada. While Luffy, Sanji, and Zoro dodge cannon balls, Eric the Whirlwind prepares a sneak attack!

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan protects the Andromeda from the mercenaries while Beka starts to wonder if they are fighting for the wrong side.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan finds a space station full of kids who believe he is there to bring peace by killing their enemies. He is manipulated into unlocking his weapons locker.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew of Andromeda is still learning how to work together as they are attacked by the Restorers.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: The Andromeda gets involved in a feud between a Than planet and a Nietzschean colony. Tyr must choose between his clan or his new family aboard the Andromeda.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: A slipstream sends the Andromeda back in time to just before the Commonwealth fell. The crew must intervene to preserve history.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Answering a distress call leads the crew to pick up Beka's brother, now a Wayist, and his friend. They are connected to environmentalists trying to prevent space travel.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: A black hole allows Dylan to communicate with his former fiancee, 300 years in the past. He can't abandon his mission to reform the Commonwealth, but can he bring her into the future?

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan is imprisoned on a prison planet and must stage an escape as his crew tries to stage their own rescue.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Castalians board the Andromeda to finalize the charter for the New Commonwealth. When the leader is discovered dead, Tyr is the main suspect.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka learns that her father's former business partner deals in a highly addictive drug called Flash. The rest of the crew holds a "garage sale" to earn money for new ship parts.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: The Andromeda discovers her "sister ship", the Pax Magellanic. The crew aboard Pax is 300 years old, but have not aged a day

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Tyr crash lands the Eureka Maru on a Nietzschean planet and develops amnesia. He must remember what he is doing before the Nietzscheans discover him and his crate of stolen goods.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Harper receives the "gift" of knowledge from a dying Perseid, only to discover that the Perseid was being hunted by a bounty hunter, who has now turned his attention to Harper.

programme.title: Gene Roddenberry's Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan is arrested for assassinating a dictator 300 years ago, by the man he helped install in his place. The new dictator ended up being much, much worse.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: After a respected educator and mother of two is found dead in small-town Alabama, the investigation focuses on fraught family relationships, but the discovery of a dark secret unveils a killer no one saw coming.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A civic-minded teen is shot to death in his own bed, but just as investigators are closing in on those responsible, a twist leaves everyone stunned.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: The mysterious shooting of a restaurateur with no solid suspects and no murder weapon leaves detectives in a lurch, but when financial motives come to light, an undercover operation and clever forensic investigation turn the case upside-down.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A military veteran is missing and a young student is murdered in what appears to be a crime of passion, but the discovery of a secret payout leads police on a wild chase.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: Passions and obsessions turn toxic when a beautiful young law student is found murdered and left in a trash can, leaving police to decipher a web of boyfriends, exes and unrequited lovers.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: The wife of a Marine, a pregnant dominatrix and a sex slave cross paths in a twisted tale of kidnapping, lies and murder.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A single mom does all she can to provide for her kids, including taking up with five sugar daddies to make ends meet, but when jealousy rears its ugly head, this mom winds up dead and her killer is not who you would expect.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: To keep their marriage fresh, a young couple turns to a life of sex games and sharing spouses, but when threesomes and foursomes lead to murder, investigators struggle to prove who killed this swinger.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A lover's quarrel and a quick cash scheme lead to the murder of a happy retiree; the Hollywood community is stunned when a body is found under its most famous landmark.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A single mother becomes a murder victim while living a double life; a web of deception, sex and murder sends detectives on a multi-year hunt to figure out who could have murdered her.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A high-speed car chase ends with a 40-year-old newlywed shot dead in front of her husband and stepdaughter; is this a robbery gone wrong, a gang ordered hit, or something more sinister.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: The quintessential girl next door is discovered brutally killed on Thanksgiving weekend; it would take investigators over a year to uncover the dark obsession that led to her murder.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A foursome, a stripper, and a biker, is just the beginning for investigators of this massage table homicide; everyone is shocked as a secret fetish for murder is revealed.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A single mother is found shot and stabbed in her kitchen; multiple suspects emerge, but the true mastermind of this murder hits closer to home than anyone expected.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: What started as a perfect marriage evolves into a threesome; after one of the participants winds up dead, the killer turns out to be someone the investigators never suspected.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: When a psychic and her adult daughter are found killed under bizarre circumstances, the list of suspects grows long as investigators discover that male escorts, blackmail, fraud and love spells all played a part in this chilling double murder.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A mom starts online dating to try and cope after an unexpected tragedy, but when she gets pulled into the underbelly of the BDSM world and then disappears, investigators spend over a year unraveling this dark mystery.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: On a flight back to Atlantis, McKay inexplicably falls ill. Fearing the worst, the doctor summons McKay’s sister to say her goodbyes. But Ronan tells Jeannie of a shrine that would grant Rodney one day to be himself again, before he dies.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: Dr. Beckett (Paul McGillion) is asked to delay his departure from Atlantis when word comes that Major Anne Teldy (Christina Cox) and her away team have stumbled onto one of Michael’s abandoned labs inside an extensive underground catacomb.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: Keller and the Atlantis team meet with the Wraith, Todd, to deliver a startling proposition. Keller believes she has found a cure for the Wraiths of their need to feed on humans but requires a test subject for this breakthrough treatment.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: McKay and Ronan volunteer to assist Dr. Jennifer Keller with a medical follow-up away from Atlantis. Later, when the pair return to her, they are surprised to learn that she left earlier but a search of the village turns up no sign of her.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1’s Dr. Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) travels to Atlantis when his research suggests that a rebellious Ancient scientist named Janus (Gildart Jackson) may have hidden a secret lab somewhere within the city.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: Jackson and McKay have reactivated the Attero device, an ancient machine designed to annihilate the Wraith. In doing so, they discover the reason the device was ultimately abandoned… Meanwhile, Todd continues to hold the Daedalus crew captive.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: With the Destiny still out of power, a plan is born to abandon the ship using the last working shuttle, in hopes that another planet will be habitable. But hope is short-lived when the only way to determine who will go and who will stay is a lottery.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: Despite severe rationing and around-the-clock security, the water reserves onboard the Destiny continue to drop. Dr. Nicholas Rush has no explanation for this latest setback but, if they are to survive, they must find a new water source soon.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: With the situation onboard the Destiny dire, General O’Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and Homeworld Command order Col. Young to execute a high-risk plan concocted by the IOA scientists which, in theory, could return the crew to Earth.

programme.title: Stargate Universe
programme.desc: After making a surprising discovery on a jungle planet, members of the team become ill. In an attempt to isolate the infection, the team sets up camp in the jungle. But when night falls, the illness will be the least of their worries.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: The SG-1 team must intervene when a major ongoing conflict between the strident Jaffa Gerak and their former enemy Ba'al puts the entire United States at risk of destruction. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: Lieutenant Colonel Cameron Mitchell disappears while trying to contact the Sodan, a band of legendary Jaffa warriors who escaped Goa'uld rule and colonized their own planet. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: Hank Landry (Beau Bridges) and his government overseers disagree over what to do about what they found in a lab: Anubis' dangerous, genetically engineered Goa'uld creation. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: As SG-1 tries to stop the spread of a deadly virus that was caused by the devious Ori, the Jaffa Gerak works on converting the rest of the Jaffa to worshippers of the Ori. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills up a NY strip steak, short ribs & chili paste, and a chateaubriand with broccolini.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde makes smoky chicken wings, whole roasted chicken, and chicken patties with chili lime noodles.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde makes an angry lobster club, a lamb birria torta, and an Italian beef combo with chili cheese.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde gets festive with ham & pineapple sliders, grilled sweet potatoes, and a coconut cocktail.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Girls Night In
programme.desc: Amber joins Jade & Chau to explain some behind the scenes conversations. Deb & Barb are shocked that Cate is considering having Nova in the delivery room. Ashley & Bar joke that Maci & Taylor need to rekindle their romance instead of cleaning the garage.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Girls Night In
programme.desc: Ashley, Tea & Chris struggle to relate when Maci opens up to Bentley about her PTSD. The Y&P moms question Mackenzie's parenting & her parenting coordinator. Jade, Chau, & special guest Amber discuss Amber's anxiety surrounding her grades.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Girls Night In
programme.desc: Everyone is excited that Catelynn & Tyler will visit Carly. Leah talks about wanting a baby as she watches Cheyenne prepare to be induced for baby Ace. And for the first time in years, Amber reunites with Leah.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Girls Night In
programme.desc: Briana & Brittany suspect more than diabetes is to blame when Mackenzie lashes out. Sean, Jade & Chau commend Gary for seeing a parenting coach. Ashley & Bar watch Cheyenne go into labor. The Y&P moms discuss Taylor's decision to get therapy.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Girls Night In
programme.desc: Leah tears up as Cheyenne gives birth to her son. Briana swoons over Tyler's romantic plans for Catelynn's babymoon. Barb & Deb take Taylor's side when he argues with Maci over childcare. Jade & Chau are excited to see Mackenzie's Dad.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Girls Night In
programme.desc: Leah, Jaylan & Corey are glad to see Gary join Amber for her therapy session. The Y& P moms are shocked by Maci & Taylor's relationship talk. Briana & Brittany question Mackenzie's parenting. Ashley & Bar are concerned & happy when Catelynn gives birth.

programme.title: Teen Mom: Girls Night In
programme.desc: Briana, Roxanne & Brittany are conflicted about Gary not telling Amber that Leah's seeing a therapist. Leah relates to Maci that she puts too much pressure on herself. Jade, Chau & Christy doubt social media is responsible for Makenzie's issues.

programme.title: Teen Mom: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: Amber, Catelynn, Maci, Cheyenne, Leah, Briana, Ashley, & Jade all come together and start a Group chat to stay in touch. Briana wins the lawsuit against a former Teen Mom 2 cast member.

programme.title: Teen Mom: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: Catelynn's anxiety rises when she notices her daughter's head is flat on one side. Jade is nervous to meet Jenelle while Sean shops for an engagement ring. Briana's stress puts a toll on her mental health.

programme.title: Teen Mom: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: Briana plans a trip to see her estranged father. Cheyenne struggles with the aftermath of the shooting incident. Maci celebrates Bentley's 13th birthday and fears the bowling alley will trigger her PTSD. Catelynn has surgery to remove a cyst.

programme.title: Teen Mom: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: Leah moves into her new house and is open to having a baby with Jaylan. Cheyenne & Zach decide they need a fresh start and look for a new house. Briana celebrates Stella's graduation and gets Cheyenne's advice on co-parenting when Luis doesn't show up.

programme.title: Teen Mom: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: Cheyenne supports Cory as his daughter is born with a heart condition. Amber is officially done with her probation. Bentley wants social media but Maci worries about online predators. Briana gets a mental health diagnosis. Catelynn sets new boundaries.

programme.title: Teen Mom: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: Catelynn invites all the moms to go on a glamping trip in Florida to celebrate Amber's birthday. Maci & Catelynn are surprised when Ashley doesn't join. Amber has a great time but the verdict of her custody case is still looming.

programme.title: Teen Mom: The Next Chapter
programme.desc: After Roe v. Wade is overturned, Maci talks to Taylor about getting a vasectomy. Ashley wants to go to nursing school in Vegas but fears the environment will be tough on Bar's sobriety. Catelynn is shocked when she finds out who Briana is dating.
