programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: La señora Guerra disfruta de haber separado a su hijastra de Maximiliano. Verónica sabe que Valentina será la próxima víctima. Además, descubre que la abuela de la joven fue envenenada. David no quiere viajar a Europa y se enfrenta a Antonia.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Alejandro trata de indagar la conexión de los Suárez con la mina del Chamuco. La ira de Antonia cae sobre Cecilia. David no la defiende y Francisca la recibe en su casa. Verónica manda a Gertrudis a contratar a todo el personal del nuevo hospital.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Lucía tiene leucemia. Alejandro está preocupado por la salud de su hija y Patricia lo consuela. Irene se sorprende al verlos abrazados. Verónica decide adoptar a Cecilia. Ella le jura lealtad a la señora Dantés. Gertrudis huye y Lucas la persigue.

programme.title: La patrona
programme.desc: Guerra siente que Verónica está interesada en su hijo. La desaparición de Gertrudis tiene a los Lobos preocupados. La psiquiatra cae en manos de Verónica Dantés. Ramón está muy arrepentido por la muerte del Tigre Suárez y desea contar la verdad.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Llevan a Juan a la casa de torturas de Dínora, la policía sospecha de ella y de Fernando. Óscar y Franco encuentran el auto de su hermano con manchas de sangre, están muy preocupados.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Juan recibe la visita de Dínora en la cabaña y se le acerca demasiado, él aprovecha para morderle con furia el labio. Fernando sospecha que Rosario se encuentra escondida en casa de Panchita.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Dínora intimida a su prisionero, quiere que la ame a la fuerza, le dice que ella es mucho más mujer que Norma. Gabriela desea que Juan aparezca para que su hija se case y deje de sufrir.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Dínora y su familia van a la hacienda Elizondo, Norma lo toma como una provocación. Los matones le aseguran a su patrona que Juan es un hombre fuerte y difícil, pero ella los amenaza.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: Emilio trata de entrar en la vida de sus hijos y se entera de la relación entre Juan y Paula, pero no le gusta la unión con Julieta. Beatriz recibe la notificación sobre la custodia de Simón y descubre que Efraín es su admirador anónimo.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: El doctor le dice a Julieta que la única solución para su enfermedad es la quimioterapia, pero no acepta. Ella discute fuertemente con Juan, él no puede creer su comportamiento. Gaspar le confiesa a Guadalupe el secreto que tiene con José.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: Julieta le confiesa a Juan que está enferma sin decirle toda la verdad. Rosario le cuenta a Consuelo un episodio triste de su pasado y ella queda conmovida. Ante las amenazas de José, Beatriz intenta escapar con el niño, pero todo le sale mal.

programme.title: Los herederos del monte
programme.desc: Julieta le revela su verdad a Juan y le anuncia el cáncer mortal del que sufre, en medio de una escena de celos para alejarlo de los besos de Paula. Emilio está preocupado por las acciones de sus hijos, sobre todo de Gaspar y José.

programme.title: La patrona

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez find Grandfather Pegleg's treasure map and summon Captain Grimby. They hope to charter his boat for the treasure hunt. But after meeting the Captain, Morticia is careful to keep the nature of the mission secret.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia Frump is madly in love with Horatio Bartholomew, the man who has everything, except the truth about her relatives. Morticia, not convinced by Bartholomew, persuades playboy Cousin Itt to stir the embers of his past romance with Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandma Frump (guest star Margaret Hamilton), comes to the mistaken conclusion that her daughter, Morticia (Carolyn Jones), and Gomez (John Astin) plan to pack her off to an old folks home. Actually, they plan to send her to a beauty farm.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia, in order to be part of the National Beautification Program, decides to become a home decorator and offers her services to the neighbors. Next door neighbor, and insurance agent, Joe Digby hires Morticia in hopes of selling them insurance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia taunts Uncle Fester into announcing that he is going to join the Peace Corps. Fester feels he's a cinch to be accepted because Gomez plans to pull strings in Washington on his behalf. The entire family agrees to help him study for the exam.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Allyn Joslyn guest-stars as Sam Hilliard, a former truant officer who now heads a private school where Wednesday and Pugsley are enrolled. When Hilliard breaks under the strain of dealing with the Addams children, Gomez buys the school.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dr. Marvin P. Gunderson is summoned to examine Kitty Kat, the ailing lion pet of the Addams Family. Morticia decides that it is the doctor who needs help. To build his confidence, human members of the family pretend to be ill so he can effect cures.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's concern that Lurch is overworked leads Gomez to the operating table to assemble a custom-built secondary butler. Lurch lets the robot do all the work and then begins to feel that he isn't needed anymore.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Uncle Fester incinerates the family's stuffed bear with his flamethrower, Morticia reports the accident to the insurance company. Mr. Henson the head of the company, sends his assistant, Mr. Digby, to handle the case.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch suffers from unrequited love over Tiny Trivia (guest star Diane Jergens), Morticia's visiting school chum who only has eyes for show business. The entire family decides to try to turn their stolid butler into a new personality.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Ophelia laments that she has been jilted, Morticia suggests a career as an alternative to marriage. She tries chemistry first (with explosive results) then turns to operatic singing. Cousin Itt is summoned to coach her to stardom.

programme.title: Halloween With The New Addams Family
programme.desc: America's first family of ghastly giddiness reunites for a Halloween celebration that will raise the…dead! John Astin, Carolyn Jones, Ted Cassidy, Jackie Coogan, Lisa Loring and Ken Weatherwax all reprise their roles from the hit original series!

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez decide to keep Wednesday and Pugsley home from school after Morticia sees the fairy tales they have to read. When the truant officer comes to investigate, he is shocked at what he finds.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley and Wednesday start a row at a party when their gift of a tarantula upsets Harold, the birthday boy. Harold's parents insist that the Addams children lack breeding and, therefore, are no longer allowed to play with their son.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Pugsley befriends Gorgo, a circus gorilla, Gorgo decides to follow Pugsley and Gomez home, where is accepted as one of the family. But Gorgo gives Morticia's tea guests, the Ladies League members, quite a shock.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family faces a crisis when Wednesday packs her spider and runs away (after being scolded for playing with Uncle Fester's TNT). When they try to file a missing person report, a detective is anxious to retire early due to their story.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Official visitors from an unfriendly nation receive the shock of their lives when they decide to exploit the Addams Family as an average uncultured family. The visitors are shaken up by Morticia's carnivorous plants among other things.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's cousin, Melancholia, wants to marry Clarence P. Harvey after most of her marital prospects have joined the Foreign Legion. Clarence recoils when Melancholia puts on a campaign to win him, backed by Morticia, Gomez and Clarence's boss.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: With a double U-turn looming, emotions run high when two teams accuse each other of playing dirty.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Racers struggle on a frightening Road Block when they're suspended high above the Atlas Mountains.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: THE AMAZING RACE takes off on its milestone 300th leg as teams race through Palermo, Sicily. Two rival teams form unlikely alliances and Racers battle to beat the clock in a high-octane go-cart race through the mountains.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: For the first time in series history, the show travels to Valletta, Malta, where teams are thrown off balance when challenged to serve drinks to the knights of Malta. Also, a blind detour leaves Racers on a slippery slope.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: One dangerous misstep leaves a Racer dangling 600 feet high in the Singapore sky, while a traditional Asian detox leaves several Teams writhing in pain.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams race to Manila, Philippines where they get muddy with an ornery Ox during a memorable switchback challenge from season five.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: On the penultimate leg of the Race, two strong teams make a potentially one-million-dollar mistake. Also, Phil Keoghan greets the teams with shocking news at the Pit Stop.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: For the first time ever, four teams battle it out in the final leg for the million-dollar prize, but one team will face a shocking elimination before making it to the finish line, on the season finale.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: For the first time, THE AMAZING RACE features 11 new teams of all dating duos: six who are preexisting couples, and five duos who meet for the first time at the starting line.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams race through Nagano, Japan where Racers take on an Olympic-sized Detour, and one team takes a tumble that may jeopardize their chances in the Race.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Tensions rise in Thailand as one team forgets their fanny pack, putting them behind, and one Racer celebrates the end of the leg when they pop a very special question.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams face a race within the Race when they attempt to navigate the chaotic streets of Bangkok, and Racers eat a traditional delicacy - a "1,000 year old egg."

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Racers strap on lederhosen for a trip to Oktoberfest in Bavaria, Germany, and one team finds their race in jeopardy after losing their fanny pack.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie and his chums take their roles as Robin Hood and his merry men seriously as they befriend a hobo at the expense of the pantries of Mayberry.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney organizes a rescue party when Andy and Helen are trapped in a cave by a landslide.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie learns a lesson in friendship when he befriends a newcomer to Mayberry.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee stirs up a crusade for a chicken farmer whose property has been condemned to make way for a new road.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney adds a vintage motorcycle to the rolling stock of the Mayberry Sheriff's department, to the Sheriff's regret.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Ernest T. Bass is a would-be Romeo, who is brought into the sheriff's home in an effort to teach him some manners.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A beautiful prisoner threatens to crumble the security of the Mayberry jail, as both Andy and Barney fall for her charms.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Otis Campbell acquires a car and threatens life and limb of Mayberry's pedestrian population.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney suffers an ego blow when Gomer out-sings him for a part in the Mayberry Choir. Andy Griffith's wife, Barbara, appears in this episode as a member of the singing group.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney disguises himself as a dummy in an attempt to solve a series of theft at the Mayberry department store.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy takes a week off, leaving Barney and Gomer in charge. A prisoner also takes off in the resultant confusion.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Gomer falls asleep on the job and Andy douses a fire to save his life. Gomer becomes a menace trying to repay the favor.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee saves money by buying a side of beef. The beef is tough, the freezer conks out, and Gomer attempts to fix the motor.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A strange mountain-style divorce ritual is frustrated by another ritual performed by Barney.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: When Opie gets caught in a scheme to sell a useless product, Barney and Gomer come to his rescue.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Joyce Jameson and Jean Carson appear as two fun-loving blondes who upset the sheriff's office.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: British comedian Bernard Fox plays an Englishman who returns to Mayberry and upsets Aunt Bee with his efficiency.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney interprets a kiss as a sign of a secret engagement between Andy and Helen. The town gets the word and prepares a surprise party for the couple.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney is furious when he sees his girl Thelma Lou kiss, Gomer.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy takes his son Opie and several of his pals on a camping trip. Barney and Gomer tag along to help out but only succeed in getting themselves lost in the woods.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Gomer Pyle decides to join the Marine Corps and immediately falls afoul of his drill instructor Sergeant Carter.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie Taylor develops a crush on his teacher, who also happens to be his father's girlfriend.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A campaign to fatten and stretch Barney Fife gets underway when it becomes apparent he doesn't match up to Civil Service physical requirements.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Aunt Bee invites relatives to Mayberry for a visit but they quickly wear out their welcome.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Ernest T. Bass (Howard Morris) goes back to school when his girl demands it.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Andy has his misgivings when Aunt Bee's old beau shows up in Mayberry and tries to win her over again.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Barney Fife buys a bloodhound to aid in Mayberry law enforcement.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: A regal vista on canvas, Bob Ross paints incredible mountains and waterfall enclosed by proud evergreens and mossy cliffs.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: This beautiful lake in the glen will leave you fully rested and at peace with the world; Bob Ross creates a quiet mountain masterpiece.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Majestic mountains reign over a colorful seascape as Bob Ross creates one of the most challenging masterpieces ever painted in a half-hour.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Take a relaxing walk with Bob Ross through a bright green grassy forest, where a smooth crystal waterway flows so, so quietly.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Visit a quaint little home with Bob Ross and experience the beauty of tender morn in the stillness of the forest; what a delightful painting.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Enjoy the warmth of the day in that quiet spot beside the rippling stream and gentle breezes - Bob Ross creates a painting so vibrant and real.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross
programme.desc: Capture a vision of glory with Bob Ross as you view the brilliance of afternoon sunlight peeking over a distant mountain top.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In Northern California, a fire rages in the middle of the night. A woman's charred body is discovered in the smoldering aftermath.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: There's never a good reason for murder, but some killers are particularly brutal—choosing their prey at random or with no apparent motive and then cunningly covering their tracks. Even so, telltale clues remain.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes the scales of justice are balanced by just a few milligrams of evidence – a couple of fibers, a tooth filling, or a smudge on a piece of tape. The biggest cases are often solved by the smallest clues.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Solving crimes may begin with gut intuition, but advanced science provides investigators with irrefutable proof. When criminals go to great lengths to mask their crimes, Investigators must step up the challenge and remain forever …undaunted.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In North Carolina, the home of a prominent couple becomes an unlikely scene of terrible bloodshed. Across the country, a California woman vanishes, worrying her family and the investigators trying to find her.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Stolen Youths
programme.desc: A young girl playing in her yard in Spokane, Washington suddenly vanishes. In St. Louis another girl leaves to visit a friend. She never arrives.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: What does it take to prove murder if the victim cannot be found? Investigators must go to extreme lengths to catch the killer when the victim is presumed dead.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some cases simply can't be solved with current technology or with the evidence at hand. But that doesn't mean they'll remain unsolved forever.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Accidental deaths, suicides, disappearances, and fires; they're an everyday part of an insurance investigator's life. But cases shouldn't be taken at face value. Forensics has become a tool for exposing insurance fraud.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic Botany & Geology: Plants help provide oxygen and nutrients for existence. Soil is the fertilizer of life. Yet both can yield clues to the time and location of a person's death.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Arson Investigation: Insurance torchings, mob burnouts and arson murders: these crimes are designed to take all clues with them. But a solid case can be built from a heap of ashes.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A killer may strike in the middle of the night, and hide clues well. But the police are always there, ready and working, and they will never give up when they're on the trail of criminals who decide it's Killing Time.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The forces of nature can reduce a body to bones in a matter of weeks. Using a unique combination of art and science, forensic anthropologists give victims a face long after they have been forgotten.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mario Arsatti claims to be an acquaintance of a good friend from Lucas' past. But it's pleasure before business. Mario has been hired to kill Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas, who blames his wife's death on his father-in-law, refuses to help the old man elude a gang of gunmen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The lazy Jackman brother's mortgage has been foreclosed. Unfit for farming, they head to a nearby town. The family patriarch becomes marshal and deputizes his sons.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and his girlfriend discover that an old hermit is very lonely. Old Tony invites them to lunch and lets them look for arrowheads on a remote part of his land.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark decide to enter a local turkey shoot to raise money to buy a ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Cattle baron Oat Jackford orders his two cowboys to run Lucas McCain and his son off their ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark gets caught on a mountain ledge, a young outlaw risks his life to rescue him and breaks his leg doing so.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The notorious Shelton rides into the town of North Fork to take revenge on an elderly Marshal who is now crippled and working for Lucas McCain.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Johnny Gibbs, Lucas McCain's brother-in-law, visits the McCain ranch. Gibbs, a rodeo rider wanted by the law, begins stirring up trouble.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A vengeful judge who believes Lucas was responsible for his son's death, kidnaps Mark McCain to revenge himself on Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A handsome Italian count arrives in North Fork. The town bully ridicules his manner of speech and dress and provokes the Count to challenge him to a duel.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A new bank opens and Banker Hamilton hires a slow-witted gunman to guard the safe. When some of the gunman's old outlaw friends arrive in town they propose he join them in robbing the bank.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark tries to play Cupid between Lucas and a stranger who arrives in North Fork, the girl's older brothers accuse him of trifling with her affections and challenge him to fight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An arch-criminal has been run out of New Orleans and is passing through North Fork. Spotting the McCain ranch, he tells McCain he wants to buy it.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Young Dan Willard takes on Marshal Micah Torrence's job. With no experience, he takes a tough stand with a bunch of Texas cowhands whose high spirits are evident at the saloon.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark are returning from a big cattle sale when the stage is robbed by three outlaws. Lucas, desperate to recover the money that was stolen, is determined to pursue the outlaws.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas gets in trouble when he accuses the foreman of a neighboring ranch of rustling some of his cattle.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An Argentine family moves to North Fork. The townspeople are unfriendly to them, making fun of their clothing and customs. The Argentinean adult immigrant is openly hostile in return.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark find themselves exposed to anthrax after they adopt a stray horse whose owner has been killed in a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: After the end of the Civil War, General Phil Sheridan, who has been appointed Governor of the New Mexico Territory, is on an inspection tour of the country.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An old friend of Lucas McCain's, a traveling photographer, comes to North Fork plying his trade. When a murder is committed, the photographer is accused of the crime.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The townsfolk of North Fork decide to give a young couple a shivaree celebration. When the drunken crowd gets out of hand and roughs up the bride-to-be, the young groom challenges them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a young boy from Brooklyn is accused of murder, Mark, believing the boy's claim of innocence, hides him until he can find the real killer.

programme.title: Alexis Arguello vs Alfredo Escalera
programme.desc: On January 28th, 1978 Alexis Arguello fought Alfredo Escalera for the WBC World super featherweight title that ended in the 13th round.

programme.title: Bernard Hopkins vs Kelly Pavlik
programme.desc: On October 18th, 2008 Bernard Hopkins fought Kelly Pavlik at the Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City ending in a unanimous decision victory for Hopkins.

programme.title: Bernard Hopkins vs Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: On September 18th, 2004, Bernard Hopkins fought Oscar De La Hoya for the undisputed world middleweight title at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas. After a quiet first eight rounds, Hopkins finished De La Hoya with a brutal body shot in the ninth round.

programme.title: Brandon Rios vs Miguel Acosta
programme.desc: On February 26th, 2011, Brandon Rios fought Miguel Acosta for the WBA World Lightweight Title at the Palms in Las Vegas. In a great back-and-forth fight, Brandon Rios knocked down Acosta hard, stopping him in the 10th round.

programme.title: Brandon Rios vs Mike Alvarado 1
programme.desc: On October 13th, 2012, Brandon Rios fought Mike Alvarado for the WBO Latino Super Lightweight Title in Carson, California. Showing his quickness and agility, Rios put on a show with a 7th round TKO victory.

programme.title: Chris Eubank vs Nigel Benn 1
programme.desc: On November 18th, 1990, Chris Eubank fought Nigel Benn for the WBO Middleweight Title at the Resorts World Arena in Birmingham, UK. Eubank's constant pressure on Benn and powerful punching led him to stop Benn in the ninth round.

programme.title: Diego Corrales vs Jose Luis Castillo
programme.desc: On May 7th, 2005 Diego Corrales faced Jose Luis Castillo for WBC and WBO World Lightweight titles at the Mandalay Bay Resort in Las Vegas in a bout that went 10 rounds that ended in technical knockout giving the win to Corrales.

programme.title: Emanuel Navarrete vs Chris Diaz
programme.desc: On April 24th, 2021 Emanuel Navarrete and Chris Diaz fought for the WBO World Featherweight title at the Silver Spurs Arena, Kissimmee that resulted with a technical knockout in the 12th round securing Navarretes victory.

programme.title: Emanuel Navarrete vs Isaac Dogboe 1
programme.desc: On December 8th, 2018, Emanuel Navarrete fought Isaac Dogboe for the WBO World Super Bantamweight Title at the Madison Square Garden Theater in New York. Navarrete was the more aggressive fighter in the match, earning the unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Emanuel Navarrete vs Isaac Dogboe 2
programme.desc: On May 11th, 2019, Emanuel Navarrete rematched Isaac Dogboe for the WBO World Super Bantamweight Title in Tucson. Navarrete put on an impressive performance, scoring two knockdowns and stopping Dogboe in the final round.

programme.title: Emanuel Navarrete vs Joet Gonzalez
programme.desc: On October 15th, 2021, Emanuel Navarrete fought Joet Gonzalez for the WBO World Featherweight Title at Pechanga Arena in San Diego. In an incredible battle, Emanuel Navarrete pulled out an impressive unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Erik Morales vs Marco Antonio Barrera
programme.desc: On February 19th, 2000 Erik Morales fought Marco Antonio Barrera for WBC and WBO World Super Bantamweight titles at Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas which ended in a split decision victory for Morales.

programme.title: Erik Morales vs Marco Antonio Barrera II
programme.desc: On June 22nd, 2002 Erik Morales faced Marco Antonio Barrera for a second time at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas for the WBC world featherweight title in a bout that went 12 rounds ending in a victory for Barrera.

programme.title: Erik Morales vs Marco Antonio Barrera III
programme.desc: On November 27th, 2004 Erik Morales and Marco Antonio Barrera faced eachother for the third and final time at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas in a bout that went 12 rounds ending in a victory for Barrera.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Five…or so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Victorious: Rex Dies

programme.title: Victorious: The Diddly-Bops
programme.desc: Sikowitz recruits the gang to form a children's band for a friend's party. When a leaked video of the group's performance becomes popular, Andre struggles to be taken seriously as a musician.

programme.title: Victorious: Cat's New Boyfriend
programme.desc: Cat begins dating Tori's ex-boyfriend, Danny (Matt Angel) and Tori becomes jealous. Meanwhile, Trina convinces Robbie, Andre, Jade and Beck to indulge their feet in callus-eating fish that she's been buying from some stranger.

programme.title: Victorious: Sleepover at Sikowitz's
programme.desc: Sikowitz invites the gang to have a sleepover at his house in order to teach them a lesson in method acting.

programme.title: Victorious: The Wood
programme.desc: The kids are excited to hear that they'll be the stars of a new reality show being filmed at Hollywood Arts. Meanwhile, Trina and Robbie are forced to work at The Grub Truck after injuring Festus.

programme.title: Victorious: The Great Ping-Pong Scam
programme.desc: Tori discovers that her friends have been secretly going to a fancy restaurant instead of playing in an annual ping pong tournament.

programme.title: Victorious: Wok Star
programme.desc: Tori agrees to help Jade find a theater to perform a play Jade wrote. But when the sponsor demands changes that will ruin Jade's play, Tori has to make things right before opening night.

programme.title: Victorious: Survival of the Hottest
programme.desc: A heat wave hits LA and the gang heads for the beach in Beck's RV. But once there, they find themselves trapped inside the RV as the temperature rises. Oblivious, Cat parties it up with some cute boys.

programme.title: Victorious: Wi-Fi in the Sky
programme.desc: Tori's flight home is delayed, leaving her no time to finish a school project with her friends. She attempts to get the work done with them over video chat, but things keep getting in the way.

programme.title: Victorious: Beck Falls for Tori
programme.desc: Tori auditions for a role in a movie. But after exaggerating on her resume, she gets hired as a stunt double. When Tori finds out her stunt is falling off a building, she's not sure she can do it.

programme.title: Victorious: Helen Back Again
programme.desc: When Principal Eikner leaves Hollywood Arts, the school hires a new principal who makes all the students re-audition in order to keep their spots. Who will get kicked out?

programme.title: Victorious: Tori Gets Stuck
programme.desc: Tori Gets Stuck: Tori is excited when she gets cast as the lead in the school play, but she has to deal with her very unhappy understudy… Jade. Tori has to avoid Jade's constant sabotage so she can perform on opening night.

programme.title: Victorious: Tori Tortures Teacher
programme.desc: The kids take Sikowitz to the theater to celebrate his ten-year teaching anniversary, but the play's subject sends Sikowitz into a deep depression. Tori must cheer him up.

programme.title: Victorious: Jade Gets Crushed
programme.desc: Andre spends time with Jade working on a song and develops a crush on her. Tori tries to help him get over his crush, but nothing seems to work, and Andre has trouble keeping his feelings a secret.

programme.title: Victorious: Who Did it to Trina?

programme.title: Victorious: Beggin' On Your Knees

programme.title: Victorious: Ice Cream for Ke$ha
